name: Blood pressure
detail: Blood pressure is the continuous measurement of the force of blood inside your arteries as your heart pumps oxygen and nutrients to your body 60-100 times per minute, 24/7.

name: Blood Tests
detail: Regular blood testing is crucial for monitoring your physical well-being, enabling you to observe and understand your body's changes over time, empowering informed health decisions.

name: ECG(electrocardiogram)
detail: Electrocardiogram (ECG is) a simple, non-invasive test that uses skin sensors to detect and analyze your heart's electrical activity and rhythm.

name: Stool test
detail: If you’ve been having stomach problems, your doctor might order a stool culture or ask for a stool sample. This test can look in your poop for bacteria, a virus, or other germs that might be making you sick.
